00035 #ifndef HARPS_NORMALIZE
00036 #define HARPS_NORMALIZE
00037 
00038 #include <harps/buffer.hpp>
00039 
00040 namespace harps {
00045   template< typename SampleType >
00046     inline void reduceNormalizingNoize(
00047       Buffer< SampleType > &_buffer
00048     ) {
00049       int index;
00050       typename Buffer< SampleType >::SampleType *raw_buffer = _buffer.get();
00051       float current_tangent = ( raw_buffer[ SAMPLE_COUNT - 1 ] - raw_buffer[ 0 ] ) / ( SAMPLE_COUNT - 1 );
00052       for( index = SAMPLE_COUNT - 2; index; index-- ) {
00053         float smoothed_value = current_tangent * ( index ) + raw_buffer[ 0 ];
00054         if( raw_buffer[ index ] < smoothed_value )
00055           raw_buffer[ index ] = smoothed_value;
00056         else
00057           current_tangent = ( raw_buffer[ index ] - raw_buffer[ 0 ] ) / index;
00058       }
00059       for( index = 2; index != SAMPLE_COUNT - 2; index++ ) {
00060         raw_buffer[ index ] =
00061           raw_buffer[ index - 2 ] * 0.05f +
00062           raw_buffer[ index - 1 ] * 0.15f +
00063           raw_buffer[ index     ] * 0.6f +
00064           raw_buffer[ index + 1 ] * 0.15f +
00065           raw_buffer[ index + 2 ] * 0.05f;
00066       }
00067     }
00068 
00072   template< int tail >
00073     class Normalizer {
00074       public:
00078         Normalizer()
00079           : top_level( 0.0f ), top_time( 0 ) {}
00083         virtual ~Normalizer() {}
00088       inline void setValue( float _arg_value ) {
00089         top_time--;
00090         _arg_value = fabsf( _arg_value );
00091         if( ( _arg_value * tail ) > top_level * top_time ) {
00092           top_level = _arg_value;
00093           top_time = tail;
00094         }
00095       }
00100       inline float getAmp() {
00101         float highest = top_level * top_time / tail;
00102         if( highest > 1.0f )
00103           return highest;
00104         else
00105           return 1.0f;
00106       }
00107     private:
00108       float top_level;
00109       int top_time;
00110   };
00111 };
00112 
00113 #endif
